text: UMvelinqangi wanibekela inkolo leyo ayibekela uNowa kanye naleyo esiyembulile kuwena kanye nesayembula ku- Abrahamu nakuMose kanye nakuJesu ukuthi baqinise inkolo, futhi ningaqembukelani kuyona, kunzima kulabo abakhonza izithombe lokho enibamemela kukona, uMvelinqangi uziqokela lowo amthandayo futhi uholela kuyena lowo ophendukela kuyena ngokuzisola
